attributes.action: Take out Assad. Joint UK & US Operation á la Bin-Laden.
attributes.additional_details:
Just as above.  Seeing three and four year olds riddled with bullet wounds sickens me. Clearly this governement can never be seen as anything other than Murderous; Let alone legitimate.


Let's lead the world (And I am not a Bush type - anything but) but let's quietly and skillfully put a stop to this and take the one man out 007 style. Give the UK another reason to announce to the world we are still very much here.  Just the one man.
